description:
Race higher, faster, and through more daring paths than ever before in the next evolution of the series. 

Experience high-speed racing and precision platforming with improved graphics, richer lighting, with curved and winding tracks that bring every course to life in a fresh, dynamic way.

Speed across towering metal frameworks and futuristic structures suspended high above the world, navigating slopes, spirals, bends, and sudden drops that demand both control and courage.

Unlock new vehicles, race against the clock, and push for the perfect run across a set of challenging courses that grow increasingly complex.
